fields.name: Enabled
fields.description: Determines whether this source subtype under source signal is enabled or disabled in Fusion detection.

fields.name: SeverityFilters
fields.description: Severity configuration for a source subtype consumed in fusion detection.

fields.name: SourceSubTypeDisplayName
fields.description: The display name of source subtype under a source signal consumed in Fusion detection.

fields.name: SourceSubTypeName
fields.description: The Name of the source subtype under a given source signal in Fusion detection. Refer to Fusion alert rule template for supported values.
